metadata.dc:description: The objective of this protocol is to know which test are needed to study an anaemia in a patient with chronic kidney disease, the differential diagnosis of renal anaemia, to know and correct other deficiency anaemias, and the criteria for referral to Nephrology or other specialties of the anaemic patient with chronic kidney disease.
metadata.dc:subject: Agentes estimuladores de la eritropoyesis
Atención Primaria
Anaemia
Anemia
Iron therapy
Ferroterapia
Erythropoiesis stimulating agents
Chronic kidney disease
Primary care
Enfermedad renal crónica
metadata.dc:title: Anemia en la enfermedad renal crónica: protocolo de estudio, manejo y derivación a Nefrología.
Anemia of chronic kidney disease: Protocol of study, management and referral to Nephrology.
metadata.dc:publisher: Nefrologia : publicacion oficial de la Sociedad Espanola Nefrologia
